name: a Walk in the City
description:
Walk through this poetic mini-game that can be completed in 5 minutes. Will you run to do the quests as quickly as possible or take your time admiring the scenery?

This prototype was one my first project made with Unity, it can be seen as a demo for a bigger game.

Controls - Keyboard / Gamepad
  • cursor left/right : move
  • shift (hold) : run
  • space : interact
Credits
  • City Art Ludicarts
  • Royalty-free Musics Kevin McLeoad
  • 3D Anime Girl Lukebox
